column1: Little Goat Diner////It was a cold rainy night.  The only thing that was going to warm my soul was some good comfort food.  Thank god my friend and I had the bright idea of stopping in at Little Goat for a no-frill
column2: stick to your ribs kinda meal.  When we walked in
column3: we had no idea that the diner was separate from the bakery and that meant the menus were also different.  We had gone in with a taste for the shrimp po'boy sandwich
column4: which sadly is available only on the bakery side.  But we didn't let that rain on our parade (HA!)!  We chose to "rough" it out and take a seat at the bar
column5: since we were to famished to wait 20 min for a table.
